page.title: 15"An Ordinary Family"
page.content: My family consists of two children and my mum and dad.My brother is 14 year old and I am 10 years old so we go to dirrerent schools. I go to Metherinham C.P. School and my brother goes to Carres Grammar School.All the family wake up at 7.00.My brother goes to school at 8.00 and I go at 8.30.We all have breakfast at 7.30. except for my dad who has his at 7.15. When I get home at 15.45 I watch television or play outside.When my brother comes home at about 16.45 he stays in and does his homework.My dad goes to work at 7.30 and comes home from R.A.F. Conningsby at 17.30.My mother goes to work at 9.00 she works at Lincoln as a secretary and she comes home at 17.30 and cooks tea for us.
